---
title: "UQ Library Technology Training Resources"
---

This website hosts manuals and resources related to R, Python, LaTeX, Bash, Git, OpenStreetMap, QGIS, uMap, OpenRefine, Audacity and Voyant Tools [training sessions held at the UQ Library](https://web.library.uq.edu.au/study-and-learning-support/training-and-workshops/online-and-person-workshops#keyword=;campus=;weekstart=).

Training resources related to other tools are available [on the Library website](https://web.library.uq.edu.au/study-and-learning-support/training-and-workshops/software-training-resources).
